revised_title: The Centres of Symmetric Group Rings: A New Approach
tldr: The authors present a set of generators for the center of the integral group ring of a symmetric group. They construct a ring with the symmetric group as a homomorphic image and use this to prove a theorem that yields a proof within substitutional analysis of Nakayama's criterion for two representations of a group to belong to the same block. This work contributes to the understanding of group and ring theory, specifically in the context of symmetric groups and their properties.
